harber muſt enter angediua north ſide far land firme land rather ſomewhat néerer iland firme land haue good road harber many time diuers ſhippes doe winter conſtrained therevnto within ſixe fadome déepe little angediua lie foure fiue ilands ryuer sanguiſijn cloſe firme land thence halfe mile forward lyeth iland goa velha old goa ilands heerein bee noted muſt vnderſtand oftentimes happeneth along coaſt ſhall find wind northweſt north northweſt without chāging bloweth ſtrong wind aduiſe ſet ſayle although blow north cleare day may hoyſe anker put sea ward wind commeth northeaſt foure mile land noone nine ten clocke ſhall anker till noone till viracoins sea wind come therewith ſayle againe towards land ſort ſhall get aduantage loofeward although bee paine labour likewiſe time ſhewe ſhall doe muſt aduertiſe coaſt seylon fifteene februarie paſt néede ſayle ilands verberijn thence cape de comorijn néede neither feare water ſtreames driue outward yet muſt bee negligent therin ſome yeares ſtormes come later ſometimes ſooner wind blow whereof muſt carefull fiftéene februarie paſt muſt remember runne inwards kéepe ſtreames runne inwards might deceiue later februarie ſtronger draw inward comming cochijn betwéene 15 20 march may wel get thence goa although viage ſome thing doubtfull paſt twentie march would counſell late many year together hath béene vpon coaſt india aprill may diuers bluſtering ſtormes croſſe wind blowing towards coaſt darke cloudie ſkies would bring great danger therefore againſt time beſt chuſe good hauen neuertheleſſe god ſend faire weather wind pleaſeth
